## http://okqa.herokuapp.com
### Welcome to our kitchen

This [hasadna](http://hasadna.org.il) project supports open Primary
election. The code contains a django project for a spcific party and allows
the party members to ask and upvote questions and for candidates to answer.

There's a google drive [collection](https://docs.google.com/folder/d/0B1rAe9zy7m-PR1lINlItRUJ3Q3M/edit)
that holds the design documents. You are invited to fork the code, improve the design and send a pull request.

## Quick Start

You can access the [live site](http://okqa.herokuapp.com) or if you're a Django developer, install
it on your local machine:

    $ mkvirtualenv --no-site-packages okqa
    $ git clone https://github.com/hasadna/ok-qa.git
    $ cd ok-qa
    $ cp okqa/local_settings_template.py okqa/local_settings.py
    $ pip install -r requirements.txt
    $ python manage.py syncdb --migrate
    $ python manage.py runserver
